title: Music Project and Design
description: Conceiving, creating, and implementing artistic projects are an integral part of many musicians’ portfolios. This is a required module for Second Majors in Music and Society; and Music, Collaboration and Production, which focuses on the processes and skills required to survey existing arts ecosystems, design, and develop engaging and innovative projects to bring them to fruition as part of their Capstone Project later on. Students will gain an understanding of the factors involved in helming a music-related project and develop their identity as a musician in a direction unique to their trajectory.
prerequisite: For Second Majors in Music & Society; Music, Collaboration & Production only.
